bibl.title: Withdrawing from the Desert: Pachomius and the Development of Village Monasticism in Upper Egypt.
bibl.note: The Pachomian monasteries illustrate the steady and innovative growth of asceticism within the towns and villages of Egypt. They were not a product of the desert movement.
